text:
[Verse]
Sunrise on my face
World spinning in grace
Feel the beat inside
Ready for the ride

[Verse 2]
Feet on the sidewalk
Heart ready to talk
Shadows play behind
Leave the past to find

[Chorus]
Dancing through life baby
Never gonna stop
Feel the rhythm maybe
Take it to the top

[Verse 3]
Stars light up the night
Dreams are taking flight
Moonlight guiding me
Endless possibility

[Verse 4]
Every single step
Closer to what's next
Songs we haven't sung
Journeys just begun

[Chorus]
Dancing through life baby
Never gonna stop
Feel the rhythm maybe
Take it to the top
title: Dancing Through Life
